title: AI Coder
description: This web application uses OpenAI's GPT-3.5-turbo and GPT-4-turbo models for feature identification (presence or absence) in text based on pre-defined instructions. Given the definition and some examples of a feature, the large language models will examine each input text and determine whether the feature is present or not. You will need to provide a CSV file with a column containing the input, together with the definition of the feature, and the result will be downloaded as a CSV file.

pages.name: page1

elements.name: apiKey
elements.title: OpenAI API key
elements.description:
OpenAI charges for using OpenAI API, so an OpenAI API key is required. You can find your API key at https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys. You can see the pricing at https://openai.com/pricing

The application runs in your web browser, and the requests are sent to OpenAI directly. The key will never be transmitted to our server or stored in any location at any time.
elements.requiredErrorText: Please enter an OpenAI API Key

elements.name: csvInput
csv
elements.title: CSV File
elements.description: Please choose a CSV file with a column containing the text to be annotated.

elements.name: column
elements.title: Text Column
elements.description: Please enter the column name in the CSV file containing the text to be annotated
elements.requiredErrorText: Please specify the column name in the CSV file

elements.title: CSV Input
elements.description: Please select a CSV file with a column containing the input text you wish to annotate. Please also specify the name of the column that contains the inputs. Here is an example of a desired CSV file:

pages.title: API Key and CSV file
pages.description: You will first provide your OpenAI API key and a CSV file containing an input column on this page.

pages.name: page2

elements.name: features
elements.title: Features

templateElements.name: featureName
templateElements.title: Feature name
templateElements.description: What is the name of the feature?
templateElements.requiredErrorText: Please enter the name of the feature

templateElements.name: featureDefinition
templateElements.title: Definition
templateElements.description: Please provide the definition of the feature

templateElements.name: models
templateElements.title: Models
templateElements.description:
Which model(s) to use? You may select multiple models and the results from different models will be saved to different columns in the resultant CSV file.

You can check the pricing of the models here:
https://openai.com/pricing
templateElements.requiredErrorText: Please select at least one model

templateElements.name: shots
templateElements.title: Zero-shot/Few-shot
templateElements.description: You may choose to use zero-shot classification or few-shot classification or both when determining the absence or presence of this feature. If you select few-shot classification, you will need to provide three examples and explanations for presence and absence of the feature
templateElements.requiredErrorText: Please select at least one option

templateElements.name: classification
templateElements.title: Classification categories
templateElements.description: If the feature is present in the input text, it can be further classified into "low" and "high", corresponding to the detection of low and high amount of the feature. If you select "absent, low, high" and few-shot classification, you will need to provide three examples and explanations for low and high amount of the feature

elements.confirmDeleteText: Do you want to delete the feature?

pages.title: Features
pages.description: You can have multiple features to be annotated. Their presence in input text will be examined independently, and the results will be saved to different columns of the resultant CSV file.
